name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】みんなありがとう！ぺこーらありがとうLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [L2y7a_zMi20]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Inugami Korone performing "Otoko no Kunshou" on stage, wearing school uniforms.
A brief transition with a dark screen between song performances.
Usada Pekora and Amane Kanata performing "Seiza ni Naretara" on stage with a band setup, playing bass and guitar.
scenes.song_name: Seiza ni Naretara (星座になれたら)

subtitles.original: 瞳は...
subtitles.english: Eyes...

subtitles.original: 今でも俺たちは忘れちゃいないぜ
subtitles.english: Even now, we haven't forgotten

subtitles.original: つっぱることが男の たった一つの勲章だって
subtitles.english: That acting tough is a man's one and only medal

subtitles.original: この胸に信じて生きて
subtitles.english: Living with this belief in our hearts

subtitles.original: つっぱることが男の たった一つの勲章だって
subtitles.english: That acting tough is a man's one and only medal

subtitles.original: この胸に信じて生きて行く
subtitles.english: Living with this belief in our hearts

subtitles.original: つっぱることが男の たった一つの勲章だって
subtitles.english: That acting tough is a man's one and only medal

subtitles.original: この胸に信じて生きて行く
subtitles.english: Living with this belief in our hearts

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は9時
subtitles.english: Soon the clock will strike nine

subtitles.original: もうそこに一番星
subtitles.english: And there's the first star of the evening

subtitles.original: 影を踏んで 夜に紛れたくなる
subtitles.english: I step on my shadow, wanting to disappear into the night

subtitles.original: 帰り道
subtitles.english: On my way home

subtitles.original: どんなに探してみても
subtitles.english: No matter how hard I search

subtitles.original: 一つしかない星
subtitles.english: There's only one star

subtitles.original: 何億光年 離れたところから
subtitles.english: From hundreds of millions of light-years away

subtitles.original: あんなに輝く
subtitles.english: It shines so brightly

subtitles.original: いいな 君は
subtitles.english: Must be nice, you

subtitles.original: みんなから愛されて
subtitles.english: Are loved by everyone

subtitles.original: いいや 僕は
subtitles.english: No, me

subtitles.original: ずっと一人きりさ
subtitles.english: I've always been all alone

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 星降る夜 一瞬の願い事
subtitles.english: A wish in a moment on a night of falling stars

subtitles.original: きらめいて ゆらめいて
subtitles.english: Sparkling, wavering

subtitles.original: 震えてるシグナル
subtitles.english: A trembling signal

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 空見上げて 指を差されるような
subtitles.english: Like being pointed at while looking up at the sky

subtitles.original: つないだ線 解かないで
subtitles.english: Please don't undo the lines connecting us

subtitles.original: 僕がどんなに 眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright I might be

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は8時
subtitles.english: Soon the clock will strike eight

subtitles.original: 夜空に満天の星
subtitles.english: The night sky is full of stars

subtitles.original: 何億光年 離れたところには
subtitles.english: In a place hundreds of millions of light-years away

subtitles.original: もうないかもしれない
subtitles.english: They might not even exist anymore

subtitles.original: 月が綺麗で
subtitles.english: The moon is so beautiful

subtitles.original: 泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I feel like crying

subtitles.original: いつの日にか
subtitles.english: Is because someday

subtitles.original: 別れが来るから
subtitles.english: A parting will surely come

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 彗星みたい 流れるひとりごと
subtitles.english: A monologue flowing like a comet

subtitles.original: 消えていく 残像は
subtitles.english: The disappearing afterimages are

subtitles.original: 真夜中のプリズム
subtitles.english: A midnight prism

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 切なる願い 誰かに届いたら
subtitles.english: If my earnest wish could reach someone

subtitles.original: 変われるかな 夜の淵を
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can change

subtitles.original: なぞるような こんな僕でも
subtitles.english: Tracing the edge of the night, even for someone like me

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方 僕らは出会ってしまった
subtitles.english: In the far distance, we ended up meeting

subtitles.original: カルマだから 何度も出会ってしまうよ
subtitles.english: It's karma, so we'll keep meeting over and over

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間で
subtitles.english: Through the gaps in the clouds

subtitles.original: 君と集まって星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 夜広げて 描こう絵空事
subtitles.english: Spread out the night and let's draw a pipe dream

subtitles.original: 暗闇を 照らすような
subtitles.english: Like something that lights up the darkness

subtitles.original: 満月じゃなくても
subtitles.english: Even if it's not a full moon
